Package org.openid4java.message

Interface Summary
MessageExtension Interface for building OpenID extensions.
MessageExtensionFactory Factory interface for creating message extension objects for a specific message extension type URI.
 

Class Summary
AssociationError  
AssociationRequest The OpenID Association Request message.
AssociationResponse The OpenID Association Response message.
AuthFailure  
AuthImmediateFailure  
AuthRequest  
AuthSuccess  
DirectError  
IndirectError  
Message  
Parameter A key / value pair which is part of an OpenID message.
ParameterList A list of parameters that are part of an OpenID message.
VerifyRequest VerifyRequest is a AuthSuccess with the openid.mode switched to check_authentication.
VerifyResponse  
 

Exception Summary
